cards.title: Generate synthetic data
cards.description: Create highly accurate synthetic training data for ML models.

sampleDataset.description: Use this sample electronic health records (EHR) dataset to synthesize an entirely new set of statistically equivalent records.

cards.title: Connect to any normalized SQL database
cards.description: Synthesize and transform data in a relational database with Gretel Relational.

cards.title: Create provably private versions of sensitive data
cards.description: Use Gretel Tabular DP, our new differentially private graph-based generative model, to generate synthetic data with strong differential privacy guarantees.

sampleDataset.description: This is the 1994 US Adult Census dataset from the UCI repository. It relates income to social factors such as age and education.

cards.title: Redact PII in sensitive data
cards.description: Perform privacy preserving transformations on your sensitive data.

sampleDataset.description: Unstructured text datasets are useful for training chatbots or other models that need large amounts of data. The emails in this public dataset need to be de-identified before they can be used to train ML models.

cards.title: Generate natural language text using GPT
cards.description: Quickly create new labeled examples for natural language tasks.

sampleDataset.description: Create believable song lyrics using this dataset of Taylor Swift hits.

cards.title: Synthesize data + evaluate ML performance
cards.description: Evaluate synthetic data performance on classification and regression models.

sampleDataset.description: Create synthetic data based on the publicly available dataset predicting opting in or out of bank marketing.

cards.title: Synthesize data at scale
cards.description: Create large volumes of synthetic records for demos and scale testing.

sampleDataset.description: Use this dataset to predict if a driver will file an insurance claim in the following year. Specify an output size in the config. By default, the model will create as many records as the input dataset.

cards.title: Generate high-quality time series data
cards.description: Use DoppelGANger to create accurate and correlated time-series data.

sampleDataset.description: Safely synthesize a dataset of daily website visitors while maintaining correlations and data patterns.

cards.title: Synthesize highly dimensional data
cards.description: Train a synthetic ACTGAN model designed to easily handle datasets with 50k+ records and 100+ columns.

sampleDataset.description: This dataset of monthly customer charges contains sensitive information and more than 20 columns.

cards.title: Balance biased data
cards.description: Use conditional data generation to remove bias and balance datasets.

cards.title: [UPDATED] Evaluate classification and regression
cards.description: Validate the quality of synthetic data for classification/regression tasks.

cards.title: Automatic anonymization for GDPR
cards.description: Use our Transform and Synthetics generative AI-based models to anonymize sensitive data to meet GDPR standards.

cards.title: Benchmark multiple synthetic models
cards.description: Evaluate multiple synthetic data models on a standardized benchmark with a single function.
